function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential contamination by COVID-19 and other fresh outbreaks of the virus","Impact":"Spread of disease, health risks, economic impact","Mitigation":"Implementing strict hygiene protocols, vaccination programs, and early detection measures","Technologies":"Advanced air filtration systems, contactless technologies, telemedicine","People":"General population, healthcare workers, essential workers","Owner":"Health authorities, government, building managers"},{"Description":"Deficiencies of buildings and the built environment revealed during COVID-19 lockdown","Impact":"Increased risk of disease spread, limited capacity for quarantine, inefficient ventilation systems","Mitigation":"Upgrading ventilation systems, implementing flexible and adaptable building designs, expanding healthcare infrastructure","Technologies":"Smart building technologies, air quality monitoring systems, modular healthcare facilities","People":"Building managers, architects, healthcare professionals","Owner":"Government, building owners, healthcare organizations"}]}
